Record.ClassificationPath: Immune System Diseases/Autoimmune Diseases/Arthritis, Rheumatoid/Still's Disease, Adult-Onset
Musculoskeletal Diseases/Rheumatic Diseases/Arthritis, Rheumatoid/Still's Disease, Adult-Onset
Musculoskeletal Diseases/Joint Diseases/Arthritis/Arthritis, Rheumatoid/Still's Disease, Adult-Onset
Record.Description: Systemic-onset rheumatoid arthritis in adults. It differs from classical rheumatoid arthritis in that it is more often marked by acute febrile onset, and generalized lymphadenopathy and hepatosplenomegaly are more prominent.
